entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with a few flurries beginning late this evening and ending overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 21 March 2023
